messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to recent budget cuts, in place of Security, your ship has been supplied with 3 crabs. Their shells are made of an indestructable fiber, and they will prove to be quite hard to kill. Treat them as you would any other security member.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is not gonna get recalled, due to the majority of stupid and brain dead people we have aboard the station

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is ERT, make sure to have a oxygen mask on, and follow the route down to the escape shuttle.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone trying to recall the shuttle will get eliminated.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.
